    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Poskrbimo za prometno varnost</string>
            <string language="en">Traffic safety</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehrssicherheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sécurité routière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Segurança de tráfego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sicurezza stradale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασφάλεια κυκλοφορίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Seguridad de tráfico</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenci že vedo, da so udeleženci v prometu. Zavedajo se, da je gibanje v prometu lahko nevarno, zato morajo poznati tudi osnovne ukrepe za prometno varnost: dobra vidljivost, pripenjanje z varnostnim pasom ter uporaba varnostne čelade in tehnično brezhibnega kolesa pri kolesarjenju.</string>
            <string language="en">What can we do improve traffic safety when on public roads with bicycle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">varnost</string>
            <string language="en">safety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">promet</string>
            <string language="en">traffic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">čelada</string>
            <string language="en">helmet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pas</string>
            <string language="en">belt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kolo</string>
            <string language="en">bicycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was kann, verbessern wir Verkehrssicherheit wenn 
auf allgemeinen Straßen mit Fahrrad.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce qui peut nous améliorons la sécurité 
routière quand sur les routes publiques avec la bicyclette.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O que pode nós melhorarmos a segurança de 
tráfego quando em estradas públicas com bicicleta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa può miglioriamo la sicurezza stradale 
quando sulle strade pubbliche con la bicicletta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό που μπορεί εμείς βελτιώνει την ασφάλεια 
κυκλοφορίας όταν είναι στους δημόσιους δρόμους με το ποδήλατο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué puede mejoramos seguridad de tráfico cuando
en los caminos públicos con la bicicleta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sicherheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sturzhelm</string>
